entry.title: Panini
entry.summary: The third season begins as Tim inherits a special gift from the grave, Dr. Brule helps advertise a panini press, and Tim and Eric start a business.
entry.content: The third season begins as Tim inherits a special gift from the grave, Dr. Brule helps advertise a panini press, and Tim and Eric start a business.
